titles.title: We Have A Great Big Wonderful God

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We have a great big wonderful God, We have a great big wonderful God. Always victorious, Always watching over us, A great big wonderful God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We have a great big wonderful God, We have a great big wonderful God. Oh, what a joy to sing Praises to our Jesus King — A great big wonderful God.{/lang-eng}
